findings.message: Recommended section missing: How to Apply section
Website appears to be missing What We Fund page(s)
findings.suggestion: Add What We Fund page(s) to your website to improve llms.txt completeness

findings.message: Inconsistent terminology for programme status - AI systems need clear status indicators to avoid directing users to unavailable opportunities
findings.suggestion: Use consistent format like 'Status: CLOSED' or standardize closed programme notation

findings.message: No specific date given for Summer 2026 opening - Users may expect more precise timing information and AI systems can't provide specific guidance
findings.suggestion: Add 'Contact foundation for specific opening date' or provide month if known

findings.message: Income range placement could be clearer - The income threshold is buried in a list rather than prominently displayed as a key eligibility criterion
findings.suggestion: Create separate 'Eligibility criteria' subsection highlighting income thresholds more prominently

findings.message: Missing guidance on common misconceptions - AI systems would benefit from knowing what users commonly misunderstand about this funder
findings.suggestion: Add guidance about common misconceptions like 'this is not emergency funding' or 'applications take time to process'

findings.message: Redundant information with mission statement - The About section largely repeats the mission statement without adding value
findings.suggestion: Either expand with unique information or remove to avoid redundancy

recommendations: Your llms.txt file is in good shape! Consider adding more detail to existing sections.
